Name: Black Forest Gateau
Ingredients: 20 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
15 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
7.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Carefully FLOAT cream. (Lightly whip or shake sealed container before pouring cream to aerate.)
Garnish with a dusting of cacao powder over the cocktail.
Review: Dessert by name and dessert by nature: naughty but nice.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 at Hush Restaurant in London, England. Hush's recipe lacked three of the essentials in a Black Forest Gâteau: kirsch, cherries and chocolate. Hence, on 28th March 2022, I created the recipe above. Hush's original Black Forest Gâteau recipe: 60ml (2oz) Vodka 22.5ml (¾oz) Chambord liqueur 22.5ml (¾oz) Crème de fraise 7.5ml (¼ oz) Crème de cassis 22.5 (¾oz) Cream
Nutrition: One serving of Black Forest Gateau contains 280 calories
